get.summary: Returns the complete list of all supported features
Returns default values of specified setting
Returns names of specified setting in specified scope (global or certain project)

delete.summary: Deletes specified setting by id and scope (global or certain project)

post.summary: Updates name of specified named setting in specified scope (global or certain project)

get.summary: Returns values (content) of specified setting by its id, scope (global or certain project) and revision

put.summary: Creates or updates named setting in specified scope (global or certain project). Creation scenario will use default setting value if no body specified in the request.

get.summary: Returns revisions history of specified setting with specified id and in specified scope (global or certain project)

BaseDocumentIdentifier.description: Unique document identifier data without revision information, i.e. in HEAD revision

CollectionsDiff.description: Represents the difference between two collections

chunkSize.description: The number of requests to the server that are allowed to run in parallel

Context.description: Represents the context for building URLs related to Polarion services

baseUrl.description: Returns the base URL constructed with the extension context

extensionContext.description: The extension context used as a base for URL construction

restUrl.description: Returns the REST API URL constructed with the extension context

swaggerUiUrl.description: Returns the Swagger UI URL for the REST API

DetachedWorkItemsPairDiffParams.description: Input data to compare detached WorkItems

compareEnumsById.description: Indicates if enums must be compared by their ID

configName.description: Name of the configuration used for comparison

pairedWorkItemsDiffer.description: Indicates if the paired WorkItems differ

Document.description: Represents a document within a project, including metadata such as projectID, space ID, and revision details

authorizedForMerge.description: Indicates whether the user is authorized for merge operations

headRevision.description: The head revision of the document

id.description: The unique identifier of the document

locationPath.description: The location path of the document

moduleXmlRevision.description: The XML revision of the module

projectId.description: The ID of the project this document belongs to

projectName.description: The name of the project this document belongs to

revision.description: The current revision of the document

spaceId.description: The ID of the space where the document is located

DocumentContentAnchor.description: Represents an anchor to which document content blocks are tied

diffAbove.description: Diff of content block above the anchor

diffBelow.description: Diff of content block below the anchor

id.description: ID of the WorkItem which represents the anchor

DocumentContentAnchorsPair.description: Represents a pair of documents content anchors for diffing/merging content blocks which potentially linked to them

DocumentDuplicateParams.description: Parameters to create a document duplicated from another one

configName.description: The configuration name to use for the duplication, which specifies which fields of work items to copy

handleReferences.description: Declares how references should be handled during copy operation

linkRoleId.description: ID of link role by which work items in target document will be linked with counterparts from source document

DocumentIdentifier.description: Unique document identifier data with optional revision information, if revision is not specified this means document is in HEAD revision

DocumentWorkItem.description: Details of WorkItem contained in a document

documentLocationPath.description: The location path of the document containing the WorkItem

documentProjectId.description: The project ID of the document containing the WorkItem

documentRevision.description: The revision of the document containing the WorkItem

projectId.description: WorkItem's project ID, it can differ from document's project ID in case of referenced WorkItems

revision.description: The revision of the WorkItem. Referenced WorkItem's can be frozen in document in certain revision

DocumentWorkItemsPairDiffParams.description: Input data to compare WorkItems contained in a document

compareEnumsById.description: Indicates if enums must be compared by their ID

configName.description: Name of the configuration used for comparison

pairedWorkItemsDiffer.description: Indicates if the paired WorkItems differ

DocumentsCollection.description: Represents a collection of live documents

projectId.description: ID of a project in which collection resides

projectName.description: Name of a project in which collection resides

DocumentsContentDiff.description: Represents the difference between inline content of two documents

contentPosition.description: Specifies if content above or below WorkItems to merge

direction.description: Enum representing the direction of a merge operation

preserveComments.description: Indicates whether comments must be preserved during merge operation

DocumentsDiff.description: Represents the difference between two documents

configCacheBucketId.description: The ID of the configuration cache bucket

configName.description: The configuration name to use for the comparison

linkRole.description: The role of the link connecting the two documents

DocumentsFieldsDiff.description: Represents the difference between fields of two documents

compareEnumsById.description: Indicates if enums must be compared by their ID

compareOnlyMutualFields.description: Indicates whether only mutual (declared in both documents) fields must be compared

direction.description: Enum representing the direction of a merge operation

fieldIds.description: List of fields IDs to be considered in the merge operation

items.description: List of fields IDs to be considered in the merge operation

DocumentsFieldsPair.description: Represents a pair of documents fields for comparison

allowReferencedWorkItemMerge.description: Indicates if merging referenced Work Item allowed

configCacheBucketId.description: The ID of the configuration cache bucket

configName.description: The configuration name to use for the merge operation

copyMissingDocumentAttachments.description: Indicates if missing referenced document attachments must be copied

direction.description: Enum representing the direction of a merge operation

linkRole.description: The role of the link connecting work item pairs

preserveComments.description: Indicates whether comments must be preserved during merge operation

DocumentsPair.description: Represents a pair of Documents for comparison

Field.description: Represents a field within a work item

htmlDiff.description: HTML diff representation of the field

issues.description: Set of issues related to the field

items.description: Set of issues related to the field

FieldDiff.description: Represents the differences between fields in WorkItems

issues.description: Set of issues related to this field

items.description: Set of issues related to this field

MergeReport.description: Merge report with detailed information about the merge operation

mergeNotAuthorized.description: Indicates whether the merge was not authorized

success.description: Indicates whether the merge operation was successful

targetModuleHasStructuralChanges.description: Indicates whether the target module has structural changes

Project.description: Represents a Polarion project with its ID, name and information about merge authorization

authorizedForMerge.description: Indicates whether the user is authorized for merge operations into this project

ProjectWorkItem.description: Details of WorkItem belonging to a project

projectId.description: WorkItem's project ID, it can differ from document's project ID in case of referenced WorkItems

revision.description: The revision of the WorkItem. Referenced WorkItem's can be frozen in document in certain revision

bundleTimestamp.description: The bundle timestamp of the setting

Space.description: Represents a space within a project

StringsDiff.description: Represents the result of comparing two strings

different.description: Indicates whether the two strings are different

result.description: The result after comparing the strings

bundleBuildTimestamp.description: The build timestamp of the bundle

externalProjectWorkItem.description: Flag indicating whether the WorkItem is assigned to a different project

lastRevision.description: Last revision number of the WorkItem

moveDirection.description: Enum representing the direction in which a merge move operation can occur

movedOutlineNumber.description: Moved outline number of the work item after a merge

projectId.description: Project ID associated with the WorkItem

referenced.description: Flag indicating whether the WorkItem is referenced

configCacheBucketId.description: The ID of the configuration cache bucket

configName.description: The configuration name to use for the merge operation

direction.description: Enum representing the direction of a merge operation

linkRole.description: The role of the link connecting work item pairs

WorkItemsPair.description: Represents a pair of WorkItems for comparison

WorkItemsPairDiff.description: Represents the differences between two WorkItems

WorkItemsPairs.description: Represents starting point of diffing multiple work items - their project names and pairs of work items to be diffed

leftWorkItemIdsWithRedundancy.description: A collection of WorkItem IDs from left project which contain more than 1 counterpart WorkItem from right project and certain link role

WorkItemsPairsParams.description: Input data for finding work items pairs

leftWorkItemIds.description: IDs of work items in left project which counterparts from right project to be found

items.description: IDs of work items in left project which counterparts from right project to be found

linkRole.description: The role of the link connecting work item pairs
